title: Tilapia Tacos With Peppers And Onions
summary: The recipe Tilapia Tacos With Peppers And Onions is ready in approximately 8 minutes and is definitely a spectacular gluten free and pescatarian option for lovers of Mexican food. This recipe serves 4 and costs $4.91 per serving. One serving contains 518 calories, 43g of protein, and 22g of fat. 14 people were impressed by this recipe. Head to the store and pick up avocados, tilapia, lime, and a few other things to make it today. A few people really liked this main course. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 99%. This score is excellent. Similar recipes include Sauteed Tilapia Tacos With Grilled Peppers And Onion, Black Bean Tacos with Roasted Peppers and Onions, and TILAPIA FISH TACOS (TACOS DE TILAPIA).

winePairing.pairingText: Pinot Grigio, Gruener Veltliner, and Pinot Noir are great choices for Tilapia. Fish is as diverse as wine, so it's hard to pick wines that go with every fish. A crisp white wine, such as a pinot grigio or Gr√ºner Veltliner, will suit any delicately flavored white fish. Meaty, strongly flavored fish such as salmon and tuna can even handle a light red wine, such as a pinot noir. The Ziobaffan Organic Pinot Grigio with a 4.6 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 17 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Ziobaffa Organic Pinot Grigio
productMatches.description: Ziobaffa Organic Pinot Grigio has fresh rich aromas of apples and pears with hints of citrus that fade into a floral bouquet and on the palate it is bright and fresh with wonderful fruit flavors.ZIOBAFFA Pinot Grigio pairs well with a wide array of lighter cuisine, especially fish/shellfish, poultry, pastas in cream sauce and softer cheeses. It's also an ideal aperitif. Blend: 100% Pinot Grigio
